item.title: Twenty-nine English councils to delay elections, minister confirms
item.description: A major shake-up of local government is underway and postponing ballots is intended to help deliver that reorganisation.

item.title: UK holds off joining Trump's Board of Peace over Putin concerns
item.description: Foreign Secretary Yvette Cooper says the Russian president has shown no commitment to peace in Ukraine.

item.title: Burnham 'in the dark' over reports an MP's seat may become vacant
item.description: The anticipated resignation of MP Andrew Gwynne paves a way for the Greater Manchester mayor to return to Parliament.

item.title: What we know about Trump's 'framework of future deal' over Greenland
item.description: Denmark and Greenland have made it clear they will not relinquish sovereignty of the world's largest island.

item.title: Caluori aims for England debut inside six months - then greatness
item.description: Noah Caluori believes he needs to make his England senior debut over the next six months to stay on track for his ambition to be one of the game's gre...
